item.description:
How about a nice pizza pie or salad to celebrate hump day? Za Restaurant on Mass Ave in Arlington uses local, farm-fresh high quality ingredients to create delicious pizzas and unique salads. They even have homemade desserts, coffee and tea. Check out their crazy good menu at http://www.zarestaurant.com/menu/index.html. Don't just take my word for it, the place gets four out of five stars from Google reviews, Urban Spoon, and Yelp!

If you don't have transportation, don't worry, we will do our best to hook-you-up with a ride. Just post a note if you can drive or if you need a ride when you RSVP and we will figure out a carpool.
item.name: Jumbo Lunch: Za Pizza
